narratives.question_text: How clearly did the instructor define the topic of study?
How clearly did the instructor outline the expectation for the course, classroom activity and homework?
How well were individual class sessions prepared and presented?
comments: Sometimes the class would go over the time but in general, it was prepared appropriately.
some lectures had too much information for a single lecture session, and it would be helpful to have them in two sessions.

narratives.question_text: How well did lectures fit within the boundaries of the course?
comments: applicability to theatre can be more clearly demonstrated through discussion of case studies.
The assignments were a great way to make students personally invested in studying safety.

narratives.question_text: How available was the instructor for help outside the classroom?
How useful were assignments in furthering an understanding of the topic?
comments: the assignments were based mostly on testing the students' awareness about the information dispensed in class. As the nature of the course is also not conceptual but informational it is difficult to say how it can be made more interesting. the assignments did not help with remembering some of the more frequently used and relevant information off-hand.

narratives.question_text: If tests were given, how fairly did they measure knowledge gained?
comments: The tests were busy-work that tested our ability to use CTRL-F to find phrases in Power-points.
tests were also based mostly on information. maybe more case study like questions and/or conceptual questions would help in understanding some of the knowledge gained.

narratives.question_text: How useful was this course in preparing you for production work?
comments: it does help, but it is difficult to assess how much.
I've already used some of the things we learned in class for production work during the semester.

narratives.question_text: How would you evaluate the instructor's knowledge of the material?
comments: the instructor's knowledge is very good, but it is difficult to understand the importance or significance of most of the information provided.

narratives.question_text: Please offer additional comments on such topics as: what worked best about the course, suggested improvements, class materials, etc.
comments: More clarity on test questions would be helpful. It's not best when I feel like there are multiple correct answers to a question.

would love to have more case study discussions from the instructor's previous experiences and/or experience of the students; especially for some of the topics for which the information discussed is readily available on the internet or in the reference books.
